column5: Does anyone know where can I find one of those Universal Boat Seat Sliders?  http://hires.basspro.com/is/servlet/izoom/BassPro/51893?  I'd like to install it on my boat's driver seat between the seat and the existing pedestal.  Bass Pro in Vaughan Mills doesnâ€™t have it and ordering from the US will add too much shipping charges. Local place selling it would be ideal.  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
